The video was published on August 9: 2020, in a public Facebook group with more than 72,000 members.
The post: s caption explicitly mentioned that the video shows a real flight crash at Calicut Airport on August 7, 2020, involving Air India Express.
A reverse image search of keyframes from: Air India Express flight 1344 crash video - (P3D)" on the YouTube channel of MPC Flight Recreations, published on August 7, 2020.
